description.p: Paladins of Bone refuse to submit to fear, inspiring it in their opponents instead. Often, these paladins make their oath with the ideal of power and glory, refusing to give up.
Paladins of Bone are notorious for their inability to stay dead.
Paladins of Bone are bringers of fear and testaments of Azisharn’s will.
Fear Above All. You must instill fear into your opponents. Spread word of your deeds by inspiring terror in hearts of others.
Grand Armour. Take trophies for each of your victories, adorn your armour with bones of the fallen.
Sharpened Will. You can never submit, push through any obstacle. Do not let rain, fire or steel block your path.

When a Paladin of Bone accomplishes a great victory, it is customary to take a trophy. Many will adorn mammoth tusks and dragon skulls, but it is not uncommon to find a Paladin of Bone who will carry etchings or momentos of fallen companions on their armour and weapons.
Additionally, as a Paladin of Bone becomes familiar with a weapon or piece of armour, it will tend to take on bone like qualities.
You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed.
When you take this oath at 3rd level, you gain the following two Channel Divinity options.

Bone Armour. You can use your Channel Divinity to cover your skin with a layer of bone. As an action, you harden your skin to the strength of steel. You gain a +2 bonus to AC. This effect lasts a minute unless dismissed.

Terrifying Aspect. As an action, the paladin channels the darkest emotions and focuses them into a burst of magical menace. Each creature of the paladin’s choice within 30 feet of the paladin must make a Wisdom saving throw if it can see the paladin. On a failed save, the target is frightened of the paladin for 1 minute. If a creature frightened by this effect ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the paladin, it can attempt another Wisdom saving throw to end the effect on it.

description.p: Starting at 7th level, you constantly emanate a menacing aura while you’re not incapacitated. The aura extends 10 feet from you in every direction, but not through total cover.
If a creature is frightened of you, its speed is reduced to 0 while in the aura, and that creature takes psychic damage equal to half your paladin level if it starts its turn there.
At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

description.p: At 15th level, the bone within your body becomes sentient. If you end your turn in battle with less than half your hitpoints, your bone hardens and grows to cover your wounds, you gain 5 temporary hit points. You also have advantage on death saving throws.

description.p: At 20th level, your bone grows and covers your entire body, heightening your senses and abilities. You can use your action to gain the following benefits for 1 minute:

You become resistant to slashing, peircing, necrotic and fire damage and when a creature ends it’s turn within a 5 foot radius of you, your bone armour atacks them, dealing piercing damage equal to 3d10 + the paladin’s Charisma modifier. Additionally, you can finish the effect early, causing you bone armour to explode outward with a bonus action, this deals 4d10 piercing damage to all creatures within 30 feet.
